I see plenty of people still bullish on $BTC when every single name in the sector $MARA $RIOT $CLSK $MSTR $WULF $HUT $CIFR look like shit. $COIN $IBIT look better; but really, just two names?? so i guess we all just pile into those two, wonder how well that ends?

$MARA $CLSK $BITF $WULF $RIOT $HIVE $BTBT $CORZ $BTDR $CIFR $IREN $HUT $WGMI $IBIT $FBIT #BTC $BTC #BITCOIN $BTCUSD 
I've been telling you guys every step of the way since I started being active here months ago. This sector is wild and is best to be traded. Got shit every time and here we are again. This is 4/4 larger moves I've called out since I've been here. 

Posted all the entries for last November.  Literally told you every day when I sold end of December and said it was too hot. 

Around new years I said miners were shit right now and noted why, people loved that lol. Tons of comments saying I'd miss the move, you're weak and on and on. Just a dead give away people have no idea wtf they are talking about. 

Then again called that miners might have turned the corner again before they even moved before Fed.  Followed by calling out all my buys here as Feb began.  

Stated all the huge trades I made in that short window, said not to fuck up making a bunch of money, got light soon after and said I was stacking a lot of this into #BTC. 

$BTC launched as miners got taken behind the shed when people were calling for miner moon launches. Narratives have to be backed by price action or they're wrong, if it doesn't make money it's just wrong. Price is the only thing that pays you.

The point is, it can be done. It's possible to trade.  I will know the day miners don't look like shit again.  It's possible to protect yourself. It can be complex or it can be more simple. You could literally just sell below a 50d or 100d or whatever if you want to go dummy style. Works for anything. Find your parameters. Set your levels. Rather than possibly lose it all or be stuck for years. A lot of these spec names don't work out and people lose a lot or get stuck in them. Figure out a plan that works for you and that can protect you. Walk away with a few scrapes or crawl away with broken legs???

I see plenty of people still bullish on $BTC when every single name in the sector $MARA $RIOT $CLSK $MSTR $WULF $HUT $CIFR look like shit. $COIN $IBIT look better; but really, just two names?? so i guess we all just pile into those two, wonder how well that ends?
